## Libraries
```{r}
# Loading packages for being able to manipulate and plot spatial data
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Reading in Spatial Files
```{r}
# Reading in the Former Municipality Boundaries Data geojson file
fmbd <- st_read('data/Former Municipality Boundaries Data.geojson')

# Displaying file table
head(fmbd)
```
## Displaying table column alone
### Basic print function
```{r}
print(fmbd['AREA_NAME'])
```
### Print function with defining list
```{r}
name <- fmbd$AREA_NAME
print(name)
```
